key_modifications: Added horizontal scrolling support with overflowX: 'auto' and WebkitOverflowScrolling: 'touch'
Implemented smooth scrolling behavior for better UX
Added responsive breakpoints for table headers with reduced padding and font size on small screens
Added responsive styling for table body cells with touch-friendly padding
Implemented touch-friendly checkbox sizing with larger SVG icons
Added responsive styling for sort labels with larger icons on mobile
Created new StyledTablePagination component with mobile-responsive layout
Modified pagination controls to stack vertically on small screens
Increased button padding for touch interaction on mobile devices

patterns_discovered.description: Used theme.breakpoints.down('sm') to apply mobile-specific styles that override desktop defaults
Increased padding and icon sizes on mobile to accommodate finger-based interactions
examples: Checkbox padding: theme.spacing(1.5) with 1.5rem SVG icons
Font size reductions: 0.7rem headers, 0.875rem body cells

patterns_discovered.description: Used WebkitOverflowScrolling: 'touch' and scrollBehavior: 'smooth' for optimized mobile scrolling
patterns_discovered.impact: Improves momentum scrolling on iOS and Android devices

patterns_discovered.description: Created separate StyledTablePagination component extracted from inline TablePagination to apply consistent responsive patterns
patterns_discovered.benefit: Improves reusability and separation of concerns

gotchas_discovered.description: TablePagination controls can cause layout shift if not properly constrained; solution uses flexDirection: 'column' with controlled gaps
gotchas_discovered.solution_applied: Implemented gap-based spacing with flexDirection: 'column' and alignItems: 'flex-start'

gotchas_discovered.description: Interactive elements (checkboxes, buttons) need minimum 44-48px touch targets on mobile; solution uses theme.spacing() consistently
gotchas_discovered.solution_applied: Standardized padding to theme.spacing(1.5) across interactive components

gotchas_discovered.description: Headers and cells can become cramped on small screens; aggressive font reduction (0.7rem) may impact readability
gotchas_discovered.risk: Headers reduced to 0.7rem may be difficult to read on some devices

gotchas_discovered.description: WebkitOverflowScrolling is non-standard but necessary for smooth momentum scrolling on iOS; missing this can result in janky scrolling
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Both standard scrollBehavior and webkit properties used together

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully implemented comprehensive mobile-responsive patterns in DataTable component

approach_outcome.testing_notes: Single successful attempt indicates well-planned responsive implementation
